title: Dollar Tree Shake-Up Was Long Overdue
sub_head: Activist Mantle Ridge will have a tough job closing the gap with Dollar General
body:
An activist investor thinks shareholders should get more bang for their buck at Dollar Tree . Shareholders seem to agree.
Mantle Ridge took a stake of at least $1.8 billion in Dollar Tree and plans to push for changes, with an eye toward improving pricing strategy at its Family Dollar chain, The Wall Street Journal reported Friday after market close.
